description: Try our easy to follow Apple And Cinnamon Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet fritter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Christmas,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple And Cinnamon Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large apples, cored, cut horizontally into 3 slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Put 1 cup sugar and 1 tsp cinnamon in a bowl and stir to combine. Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, add milk, flour, baking powder, remaining sugar, vanilla, remaining cinnamon and nutmeg. Whisk until thoroughly combined.

Dip each apple slice into the batter, shake off excess and place onto prepared tray. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Brush with coconut oil or nut butter and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Serve immediately. Note: While every care has been taken to ensure recipes are vegan, always check labels as ingredients differ from brand to brand.
